text: Willem "Wim" Ruska (29 August 1940 – 14 February 2015) was a Dutch judoka. He was the only athlete to win two judo medals in one Olympics – in the heavyweight and absolute categories in 1972. Ruska was admitted to a nursing home in 2014, he died on 14 February 2015, aged 74. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch judoka Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam
title: Wim Ruska
